Class Client

java.lang.Object
Model.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connectable, IClient
public class Client extends Object implements IClient
This Class represent a client computer
Author:
Elad_Armoni

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Client(String iP)
    Client constructor gets the ip and create a new client with this ip First client does not connect to server so connectToServer is null
